doc.name: objectSelectionEnded
doc.summary: Sent when, in edit mode, the user completes a drag action used to select controls.

description.overview: Handle the objectSelectionEnded message if you want to do something when the user completes a drag action used to select controls.
description.comments:
The objectSelectionEnded message is sent to the current card when, in edit mode, the user stops dragging over controls.
The objectSelectionEnded message is only available in the IDE.
